merpi_desc: %USER's eyes, big or small. Any color of the rainbow. They really are the window into the soul, even if they might be eyeing up your butt.

merpi_flowery: %USER stares at %TARGET's %T_PART with nothing but scorn, it's clear from the look they're giving it that it is so far beneath them!!
%USER dances their eyes over %TARGET's %T_PART like a shy creature trying to not let them notice the look.

merpi_normal: %USER hovers their glance a bit longer on %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER definitely gets caught staring at %TARGET's %T_PART, their eyes lingering for just a little too long.  On purpose.

merpi_normal: %USER really takes a long look at %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER lingers their sight on %TARGET's %T_PART, clear that whatever it is it's having an effect on them.

merpi_normal: %USER eyes seem to be swimming at the sight of %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER doesn't even try to hide the fact that they're taking in the sight of %TARGET's %T_PART like the family dog eyeing the thanksgiving turkey.

merpi_normal: %USER eyes have really been grabbed by %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER just can't drag their eyes away from %TARGET's %T_PART, and looks miserable for it.  Like they wish they could stop themselves.

merpi_normal: %USER just can't keep their eyes off of %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER is one hundred percent visually locked on to %TARGET's %T_PART, they aren't going to look away, and don't want to.  They also don't care if they get noticed.
merpi_repeat: %USER doesn't want to look away from %TARGET's %T_PART!

merpi_flowery: %USER eyes glaze over, the thought of %TARGET's %T_PART is just too much for them to handle right now.  Call back later.

merpi_normal: %USER eyes are on fire with lust for %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER eyes are one thing, but the rest of them looks like they're about to leap on %TARGET to take %T_PART wether they want it or not.
